Add row with counts

Source: R/add_hierarchical_count_row.R
add_hierarchical_count_row.Rd

Typically used to add a row with overall AE counts to a table that primarily displays AE rates.

Usage 

add_hierarchical_count_row(
  x,
  label = "Overall total number of events",
  .before = NULL,
  .after = NULL
)

Arguments

x

(gtsummary)
a gtsummary table

label

(string)
label for the new row

.before, .after

(integer)
Row index where to add the new row. Default is after last row.

Value

gtsummary table

Examples 

# Example 1 ----------------------------------
cards::ADAE |>
  # subset the data for a shorter example table
  dplyr::slice(1:10) |>
  tbl_hierarchical(
    by = "TRTA",
    variables = AEDECOD,
    denominator = cards::ADSL |> dplyr::rename(TRTA = TRT01A),
    id = "USUBJID",
    overall_row = TRUE
  ) |>
  add_hierarchical_count_row(.after = 1L)
